description: This Java abstract class 'CodeProducer' defines a base for code generation across different programming languages. It includes methods for generating code for Wrappers, handling file creation, and utility functions related to package and file path management.

classes.name: CodeProducer
classes.description: Abstract class laying out a template for generating code based on Wrappers and language options.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Performs code generation for multiple languages.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Generates code for a single Wrapper into a file.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Generates code for a single Wrapper into a StringBuffer, typically for assembling code.

methods.name: getDirForPackage
methods.description: Converts a package name into a directory path.

methods.name: createFile
methods.description: Creates a new file with specified content, handling directory creation and overwriting existing files.
